original_title: Walt Disney's Timeless Tales: Volume Three
overview: In Walt Disney's Timelss Tales: Volumne Three you visit the famed baseball diamond of Mudville for a retelling of the classic "Casey At The Bat," and meet the mouse behind legendary Founding Father Ben Franklin in the Academy Award(R)-nominated short "Ben And Me" (1953, Best Short Subject, Two Reel). Also included are "Morris the Midget Moose" (1950), "The Golden Touch" (1953), "The Wise Little Hen" (1934), and "Little Hiawatha" (1937)
title: Walt Disney's Timeless Tales: Volume Three
